label: 大江以言
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (955-1010). Tutor to Fujiwara no Atsushige. Kanshi in Honchō reisō(20), Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集(11), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (42), and Sakumon daitai (2). [藤原篤茂、漢詩、本朝麗藻、作文大体]
